list.abs: weak ridicules , after winning this petroleum Derby , FA Premier League fifth grade school leader Abramovich may swing the index finger to first grade newborn Ahl Faximu , then delivers this admonition .弱弱的揶揄一下，赢下这场石油德比之后，英超五年级学长阿布拉莫维奇或许会向一年级新生阿尔法希姆摇摇食指，然
the typist received an admonition from the supervisor for being careless .那个打字员因粗心大意受到监督人的训诫。

all these are great advances-but in the end , perhaps , not as great as the threat and promise of self-knowledge . Whichrecalls the oracle' s second admonition : nothing in excess .所有这一切都是伟大的进步但终归，也许，不如自我认识带来的威胁和希望巨大，这让人想起神殿门口的第二条箴言：凡事有个度。
we've all heard the admonition : " Cut your losses , let your profits run " .我们都听过这样的格言：斩断亏损，让利润奔跑。
